text: Thatta District (, ) is in the province of Sindh, Pakistan. According to the 1998 census of Pakistan, it had a population of 1,113,194 of which 11.21% were urban. ==Tehsils== * Ghora Bari Tehsil * Jati Tehsil * Mirpur Bathoro Tehsil * Mirpur Sakro Tehsil * Shah Bander Tehsil * Sujawal Tehsil * Thatta * Kharo Chan Tehsil * Keti Bander Tehsil Category:Districts of British India Category:Districts of Sindh
title: Thatta District
